body:
Hello Avicus Network
Thank You everyone for supporting me in YouTube on the Avicus Network. Last night I reached 100 subscribers!!! (now 101). That is a amazing milestone for me.
I hope that you have enjoyed my content over the past year. To say thankyou I will be uploading a AMA (Ask Me Anything) and recording it tomorrow. So keep those questions incoming on the following link (https://avicus.net/forums/4b996cf73)

I will also be uploading a 4 part series 1 part being released every week starting next week so stay tuned for that! But in all seriousness thank you all who have supported me on my YouTube channel and lets continue it to grow!

P.S. I am currently working on art and stuff and things to do for my podcast still pondering whether it should be a avicus podcast on my channel or something else?
body_tagged:

title: A Milestone had been reached!

replies.body: I probably would never reach that in 15 years xP
replies.body_tagged: I probably would never reach that in 15 years xP

replies.body: My channel has recently had its Channel Birthday 1 Year Celebration and so I guess its good that we now have 100 its a good Channel Birthday present! :)
